vacancyBody:
E-ngineers company works in telecommunications, banks & risk management, e-commerce and monitoring of software deliveries in large corporates. We are focused on development of web and mobile applications as well as DevOps projects.

Required Skills:

4+ years of work experience involving quantitative data analysis and complex problem solving
A strong understanding of statistical concepts, measurement issues, and inference techniques
Mastery of SQL, Excel, and either Python or R, along with some experience with Tableau, Mode, or other visualization software
Experience with ETL pipelines, scheduling and productionalizing is a plus
Experience with A/B Testing, Experimentation, or Casual Inference
C1 level of English

Production Quality Engineer (m/f/d)
ZF, –ò–∑–º–∏—Ä/nYour tasks:

üîπ To ensure the product quality and to ensure that the production quality control (process and final) departments are carrying out their tasks in a good coordination and effective manner
üîπ Together with Production people, to analyze and create solutions for customer complaints and internal quality-related problems, to prevent their reoccurrence, to ensure the implementation of correction and preventive actions, FTA and 8D activities, to follow up the open correction and preventive actions
üîπ To manage APQP & PPAP activities as a project team member during the new product launch process
üîπ To perform process and product audits and follow the next steps for open topics and manage Quarantine area
üîπ To prepare Quality related reports (weekly/monthly)

Your profile:

üîπ Graduated from Mechanical or Industrial Engineering departments of universities, with at least 3 year of production quality control or project experience in the automotive industry
üîπ Preferably have experience in IATF 16949 QMS and have IATF 16949 Internal auditor certificate, have knowledge of process and system audit methods  
üîπ Preferably have knowledge of machining and assembly production processes and products
üîπ Knowledge of statistical techniques and problem solving methods, knowledge of measurement methods and the use of relevant test equipment
üîπ Good English speaking and writing skills
